mapper.select: SELECT TMG_F_GET_ME_NAME ( D.HD_CEMPLOYEEID_CK, #{recordDate,jdbcType=DATE} , 0, D.HD_CCUSTOMERID_CK, D.HD_CCOMPANYID_CK ) as NAME, ( TMG_F_GET_MO ( D.HD_CSECTIONID_FK, #{recordDate,jdbcType=DATE},0, D.HD_CCUSTOMERID_CK, D.HD_CCOMPANYID_CK,#{language} ) ) AS SECTION, TMG_F_GET_MGD ( TMG_F_GET_WORKERTYPE ( D.HD_CEMPLOYEEID_CK, #{recordDate,jdbcType=DATE}, D.HD_CCUSTOMERID_CK, D.HD_CCOMPANYID_CK ), #{recordDate,jdbcType=DATE}, D.HD_CCUSTOMERID_CK, D.HD_CCOMPANYID_CK, #{language}) AS WORKTYPE, ( TMG_F_GET_MP ( D.HD_CPOSTID_FK, #{recordDate,jdbcType=DATE}, D.HD_CCUSTOMERID_CK, D.HD_CCOMPANYID_CK,#{language} ) ) AS POST FROM HIST_DESIGNATION D WHERE D.HD_CCUSTOMERID_CK = #{custId} AND D.HD_CCOMPANYID_CK = #{compId} AND D.HD_CEMPLOYEEID_CK = #{employeeId} AND #{recordDate,jdbcType=DATE} BETWEEN D.HD_DSTARTDATE_CK AND D.HD_DENDDATE AND D.HD_CIFKEYORADDITIONALROLE = 0
